generationPrompt:
Create a professional Linen fabric texture sample for the Compozit Vision interior design mobile application.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS - NO TEXT OR LABELS:
- ABSOLUTELY NO TEXT, LETTERS, WORDS, OR LABELS anywhere in the image
- PURELY VISUAL representation only
- NO typography, captions, or written elements
- Visual elements ONLY

ASSET DETAILS:
- Name: fabric-linen-sample
- Purpose: Show linen fabric texture
- Emotion/Feel: Natural, relaxed, breathable
- Style: High-resolution texture close-up
- Category: image

VISUAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Dimensions: 200x200 pixels
- Primary Colors: #C9A98C (warm beige), #B9906F (brown), #FDFBF7 (cream background)
- Quality: High-resolution, professional grade
- Format: Optimized for mobile app interface
- Background: Transparent or clean background

SPECIFIC CONTENT:
Close-up linen fabric weave showing natural fiber texture

STYLE GUIDELINES:
- Premium, luxury design aesthetic
- Clean, modern, sophisticated look
- Brand-consistent color palette
- Mobile-optimized clarity and readability
- Professional photography/design quality
- NO sepia or vintage filters unless specifically for style
- Bright, clear, natural presentation

NO TEXT ENFORCEMENT:
- Verify NO text appears anywhere in the image
- Use only visual symbols and imagery
- Represent concepts through visual elements only
- NO written words, labels, or typography



Generate a high-quality png image that meets these specifications exactly, with ABSOLUTELY NO TEXT OR LABELS.
noTextRequirement: CRITICAL: This image must contain NO TEXT, LABELS, or typography
nextSteps: Use the generation prompt with Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview
